import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import data from '../data/data'; function Home(props) { return
    { data.products.map(product =>
  • {product.name}
    {product.brand}
    ${product.price}
    {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReiews} Reviews)
    • ) }
} export default Home;
